summary: Lab workflow experiments scaffolding added (lab_workflow_* schemas/envelopes), planning artifacts prepared for WF_LAB_01, MOVA core left untouched.
changes: Added lab schema directory with lab_workflow_procedure/config/result/episode_data v1 JSON Schemas.
Added lab envelope directory with lab_workflow experiment plan/generate/run/aggregate request schemas composed with MOVA 4.0.0 envelope fields.
Recorded planning and snapshot requests for WF_LAB_01 (skill run requests + planned episodes).
Updated package.json to include memory:snapshot script and restored memory tools/docs from stash.
notes: Memory import scripts (import_episodes/import_decisions) are referenced in package.json but source files are not present in lab/tools; memory:import currently fails. Latest SQLite snapshot available at lab/memory/SQLITE_MEMORY_SNAPSHOT_20251210_092946.json.
